_header: The Jews used of old custom
_description: Gospel, ‘Domnica prima post octavas epiphanie’ (should be ‘infra Octtavas Epiphanie’), in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Þe iews vsed of ald customVnto ierusalem forto com…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …His grace vnto vs here gif heThurgh prayer of his moder fre
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Cum esset ihesu crist annorum duodecim”; ends “Amen.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Remansio Cristi in templo Dominica i post octobas epiphanie Euangelium secundum Lucam (rubric, ff. 31vb-32ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.272-279.
